card.title: IELTS Mock Tests Like No Other
card.text: The best way to be IELTS-prepared!

img.alt: Flexibility To Fit Your Needs Slide

card.title: Flexibility To Fit Your Needs
card.text: Unlimited access to online courses and exercises.

img.alt: Everything You Need To Succeed Slide

elements.title: Online IELTS Test
text: Our mock tests evaluate your listening, reading, writing and speaking skills as does the real test. To take the test you only need a computer and internet connection so you can take them where you want an when you want.

elements.title: In-Depth Scoring
text: You will be scored as the real IELTS test, you can check immediately your scores for the reading and speaking parts os the tests, the speaking and writing parts will be evaluated by one of our certified teachers in less than 24h.

elements.title: Unlimited Tests Access
text: You can take all the mock tests you need to be prepared, the reading and listening parts of the tests are completely free, you will only be charged if you need the assessment of one of our certified teachers to evaluate the speaking and writing parts of the test.
All the scores of the tests you take are saved so you can easily see your progression and know where to focus your energy.

elements.title: IELTS Tests Like No Other
text: Our mock tests have been created by our expert team of certified teachers with years of experience in IELTS tests.

With our IELTS mock tests your four skills, reading, listening, speaking and writing will be tested, with the same content, structure, timings and question types as if you were taking the real IELTS test.
